entry.title: Monty's Compostable Cornstarch Dog Poop Bags, 120 Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Biodegradable Dog Poop Bags
Price: 15.00

Introducing our¬†brand new eco-friendly, biodegradable and home compostable dog poop bags! Our bags have been designed to¬†offer dog¬†owners, sitters and walkers¬†a more eco-friendly alternative to conventional plastic poop bags.

Monty's Cornstarch Poop Bags are made from cornstarch and renewable bio-based plant materials PLA and PBAT¬†and are designed to biodegrade fully when returned to the Earth leaving zero harmful toxins, chemicals or waste behind.

Conventional plastic poop bags can take 500+ years to break down, if ever. Our compostable¬†bags take a maximum of 3-6 months to fully decompose making these an amazing¬†sustainable swap.

Features + Benefits

  • BPI¬Æ Certified Compostable
  • 8 Rolls, 120 bags per box
  • Each¬†box lasts roughly 2 months, depending on frequency of use
  • 100% plastic free, eco-friendly, biodegradable and compostable
  • Packaged in 100% recyclable paper box
  • Unscented, fragrance free
  • Durable and leak proof, designed to handle even the biggest¬†¬†

    üí©¬†

Monty's Bags are made from

  • Cornstarch which¬†is the starch derived from corn grain.
  • PLA¬†is a¬† renewable bio-based plant material¬†which fully breaks down when returned to the soil, leaving toxins or chemicals behind.
  • PBAT¬†or¬† polybutylene adipate terephthalate is¬† renewable bio-based plant material which fully breaks down when returned to the soil, leaving toxins or chemicals behind.

entry.title: Bamboo Straw - Single
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sip Naked
Type: Bamboo Straws
Price: 1.50

Sip Naked believes in sustainable living.¬†They encourage everyone to not only practice the 3 Rs, but to reinforce that the first R is reduce. Recycling is a last resort, used only when we are no longer able to reduce or reuse.

Bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and anti-bacterial. It requires no irrigation or pesticides.

Bamboo is ideal for hot and cold drinks because bamboo is temperature resistant.¬†No matter what your drinking‚Äîa warm cup of tea, piping hot chocolate, or an icy cold drink‚Äîour bamboo straws make it easy to enjoy any beverage while being environmentally conscious.

Each¬†straw¬†is made in China from moso bamboo and¬†the boxes are made and printed in British Columbia.

entry.title: Re‚Ä¢Nu Wrap - Zero Waste Furoshiki Wrap - Chambray Denim
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bellantoni
Type: Gift Wrap
Price: 15.00 - 20.00 (3 variants)

Reusable, Recycled, Textile Waste Diverted + Single-Use Gift Wrap Diverted.¬†

Meet the Re‚Ä¢Nu Wrap: Zero Waste Furoshiki Wrap made form textile waste. Each wrap is sewn in Vancouver, Canada, with fully finished edges to ensure longevity of use. Use the Re‚Ä¢Nu Wrap can be tied more than 10 different ways. Use it as gift wrap, a lunch bag, wine bottle wrap, bandana, etc.

Eco Recipe

  • 100% Reclaimed Fabric
  • Handmade in Vancouver in small quantities.

Care

Machine wash cold, delicate cycle. Tumble dry low. Iron on low-medium.

What's Included?

  • 1 Wrap
  • Instructions within packaging
  • ‚ÄùTo:/From:‚Äù Hangtag, made from 100% recycled kraft paper and biodegradable hemp twine

Sizes

  • Small: 16‚Äù x 16‚Äù - fits small items, such as scrunchies, makeup, candles, small boxes, etc.
  • Medium: 20‚Äù x 20‚Äù - fits average items, such as books, clothing, bundled items, wine bottles, etc.
  • Large: 25‚Äù x 25‚Äù - fits larger items, such as boxes, toys, bundled items, etc.

Did you know?

Canadians produce an average of 540,000 tonnes of gift wrap waste each year, which is often made with plastic particles. That‚Äôs equivalent to 100,000 elephants. Our goal is to reduce this number by introducing the Re‚Ä¢Nu Wrap as a replacement that can be reused over and over again.

entry.title: LUV IT Beauty Pillowcase
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cloth in a Box
Type: Pillowcase
Price: 30.00

The LUV IT pillowcase is your perfect ally for a good night's sleep. Its soft satin side if good for the skin, keeps hair shiny while preventing frizz and even protects eyelash extensions. Both comfortable and practical! Its absorbent side is perfect for controlling moisture in wet hair without leaving your pillowcase wet. Do you want to add a hair treatment to your nightly ritual? The pillowcase is a must. Sleep soundly- LUV IT looks after your well-being!

Benefits

  • Good for the skin
  • Keeps hair shiny while preventing frizz
  • Protect eyelash extensions

Caring for your LUV IT¬†

Before your first use, was with mild detergent in warm water. After consecutive uses, machine wash and tumble dry low only. Do not use chlorine, bleach detergent or fabric softener.

entry.title: BIG Unscented Solid Dish Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Make Nice Company
Type: Solid Dish Soap
Price: 36.00

Over 2.5x the size of the regular sized solid dish soap!

Completely fragrance-free.

Each BIG cube replaces up to 8 bottles of liquid soap. Ditch the¬†plastic!¬†

Ingredients

Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, olea europaea (olive) oil, aqua, sodium hydroxide

To use

  • Create suds by rubbing the solid dish soap with a brush or sponge.
  • Wash and rinse well.
  • Use warm water for best results.

entry.title: Charcoal Solid Dish Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Make Nice Company
Type: Solid Dish Soap
Price: 15.00

Activated charcoal has toxin absorbing and antibacterial properties. It absorbs and binds to harmful microbials so they could be flushed away.

Our solid dish soap is perfect zero waste option that cuts grease while staying gentle on¬†your hands.¬†This powerhouse cleaner can even take stains out for your cloths or spot clean your carpet.¬†

Completely fragrance-free.

Each cube replaces up to 3 bottles of liquid soap. Ditch the¬†plastic!¬†

Ingredients

Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, olea europaea (olive) oil, aqua, sodium hydroxide, activated charcoal

To use

  • Create suds by rubbing the solid dish soap with a brush or sponge.
  • Wash and rinse well.
  • Use warm water for best results.
